title: ICYMI - Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie on How to Raise a Feminist Child
itunes:title: ICYMI - Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie on How to Raise a Feminist Child
description:
Nigerian author Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie discusses negative stereotypes of feminism, the implications of chivalry on gender roles and her book "Dear Ijeawele."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
